channel.title: Project
channel.description:
[b][i]This server is based off of Project Czar. This does not require any client, there are no 'Silabsoft' items in the shops at all, the home login spot is a wilderness spot you may want to change that... Here are some pictures: [center][IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/basicpking.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/basicshop.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/basicthief.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/questtab.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/stats.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/telesworking.jpg[/img] [/center]
[IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/druidanim.gif[/img] [b][i]Features:[/i][/b] [i]-Thieving from Guards. -1 Connection per IP, stops SYI. -Removed Emote Tab junk and added the basic Emote names. -Emotes not yet working. -Basic PvP. -Fixed trade dupe. -Quest Journal junk all removed. -The source is not that messy. -Inside it also includes; Character deleter, and a .class deleter.[/i] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/new5Frd.gif[/img] -Right-click stats, a bit buggy. Also if you're mod + it kicks people. :o -Fixed trade dupe. -30% Working prayer. -100% Working teleports in the Magic Book. -Thieving in Ape Atoll *Stalls* -All areas safe except wilderness.
[center][b]This is only Version 1. Version 2 is having some work finished on it then it will be released ;)
[size=15pt][/size]Credits: [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=173394]Kihomura[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=345664]Digital Hotdogs[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=346513]K0Killer2[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=349668]PKN00B[/url] JekilD [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=304685]I PK Pigeons[/url][/b][/center] [b]Download links:
[url=http://uppit.com/SOMMJK]Version 1.[/b] [IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z84/erowe9/new5Frd.gif[/img]

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

Thanks I am planning to work a heap more on V2. Adding lots more features.
All I did there was take Project Czar, rename it, remove a bit, change shops, add 1 connection per IP, add some better thieving, made the server lag ALOT less.

Read full topic

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:17, topic:259595”][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=342814.msg2657058#msg2657058 date=1233945877]
Because he prefers Czar, and rs2dv hasn’t got anywhere.
Its a waste of time to even bother.
[/quote]

wL Servers are horribly coded. If your going to make a server that does really well you might aswell start with a stable source. Aswell as “rs2dv” theres a C++ Server that works really well![/quote]

Well then sir, prove me wrong and make a decent rs2dv server.
What’s the point of having a stable server, if nobody will come on it because of the lack of features?

Oh and Btw, the right click stats thing fix…
I know why it kicks you if your mod or admin

case 39:	// highscores
if (playerRights == 0)
{
StatsMenu();
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod:"+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
      BufferedWriter bw1 = null;

      try { 
         bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
	 bw1.write(playerName+" kicked "+p5.playerName);
	 bw1.newLine();
	 bw1.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw1 != null) try {
	    bw1.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
	 }
      }

      try { 
         bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Administrator/My Documents/Project/Project/logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
	 bw1.write(playerName+" kicked "+p5.playerName);
	 bw1.newLine();
	 bw1.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw1 != null) try {
	    bw1.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
	 }
      }
}
else if (playerRights >= 2)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:"+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
}


break;

Should explain it

Just change it to…

case 39:// highscores
if (playerRights >= 0) {
StatsMenu();
}
break;

Simple enough

Read full topic

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:17, topic:259595”][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=342814.msg2657058#msg2657058 date=1233945877]
Because he prefers Czar, and rs2dv hasn’t got anywhere.
Its a waste of time to even bother.
[/quote]

wL Servers are horribly coded. If your going to make a server that does really well you might aswell start with a stable source. Aswell as “rs2dv” theres a C++ Server that works really well![/quote]I’ve looked into Devolution. It’s the most annoying shit I’ve ever been through. Maybe when I decide to get “serious” I’ll use something a little more stable, or make something stable myself. But for now, I’m sticking to what I’m comfortable with, as Pigeons said, and what offers the most.

Read full topic

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“I PK Pigeons, post:4, topic:259595”]Looks ok, something to work off.

Btw to fix the nonwild thing…

	public boolean nonWild() {
		if ((absX >= 2942 && absX <= 3392&& absY >= 3520 && absY <= 3967)) {
			return false;
		} else {
			return true;
		}
	}

Makes everything safe, except the actual wildy.[/quote]Haha thanks I was actually trying to do that for V2 right now.
UPDATE: The download for the server, well, the server was stuffed up. It is now fixed!
UPDATE: All areas are now safe except the actual WILDERNESS.

Read full topic

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Looks ok, something to work off.

Btw to fix the nonwild thing…

	public boolean nonWild() {
		if ((absX >= 2942 && absX <= 3392&& absY >= 3520 && absY <= 3967)) {
			return false;
		} else {
			return true;
		}
	}

Makes everything safe, except the actual wildy.

Read full topic

item.title: Project
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[b][i]This server is based off of Project Czar.
This does not require any client, there are no ‘Silabsoft’ items in the shops at all, the home login spot is a wilderness spot you may want to change that…
Here are some pictures:
[center]





[/center]


Features:
-Thieving from Guards.
-1 Connection per IP, stops SYI.
-Removed Emote Tab junk and added the basic Emote names. -Emotes not yet working.
-Basic PvP.
-Fixed trade dupe.
-Quest Journal junk all removed.
-The source is not that messy.
-Inside it also includes; Character deleter, and a .class deleter.

-Right-click stats, a bit buggy. Also if you’re mod + it kicks people. :o
-Fixed trade dupe.
-30% Working prayer.
-100% Working teleports in the Magic Book.
-Thieving in Ape Atoll Stalls
-All areas safe except wilderness.

[center][b]This is only Version 1.
Version 2 is having some work finished on it then it will be released

[size=15pt][/size]Credits:
Kihomura
Digital Hotdogs
K0Killer2
PKN00B
JekilD
I PK Pigeons[/b][/center]
[b]Download links:

[url=http://uppit.com/SOMMJK]Version 1.[/b]

Read full topic
